title: Claude could argue the other side
detail: It's easy to build a case for what you already believe. Asking Claude to argue the other side—with genuine effort—exposes weaknesses in your thinking and often strengthens your final position. The best ideas survive scrutiny.
surface_triggers: User presents a confident opinion or position. User is making a decision and seems certain. User is building an argument or case for something. Topic has multiple valid perspectives. User might benefit from stress-testing their thinking.
